product_name: LancomeLa Base Pro Oil-Free Longwear Makeup Primer
summary: SummaryLancome's long-lasting La Base Pro Oil-Free Longwear Makeup Primer with Elasto-Smooth technology refines the look of skin texture and diffuses light to blur the look of imperfections for a smooth makeup base. This primer for oily, normal, and dry skin is oil-free, allowing makeup to last all day.
details: DetailsFeaturesLanc√¥me's #1 artistry face makeup primer ensures makeup glides on seamlessly and helps color stay more true and vibrantLa Base Pro provides a refined skin texture by diffusing light to visibly reduce lines and imperfections, for noticeably smoother skin with a satin finishBenefitsGlides smoothly and evenly over skinPromises a base for longwear makeup - stay true, more vibrant colorLeaves skin perfectly matte and satiny-soft, never greasyElasto-Smooth technology forms a silk-like network on skin to create a soft-focus effect, like a filter on a camera lensContains silicons and emollients that create an even canvas for foundationOil-free formula feels comfortable on skin and controls shineIdeal for all skin typesItem 2235646How To UseGently tap base of bottle on to palm of hand to help settle product and allow pump to flow freely when dispensing product.Apply a small, pea size amount to fingertips and distribute evenly. Gently blend all over face. Can be used over serums and daily moisturizer.Pair with Lanc√¥me Prime It Boost It All Day Eyeshadow Primer on your eyelids for an all-over makeup base.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Gently tap base of bottle on to palm of hand to help settle product and allow pump to flow freely when dispensing product.Apply a small, pea size amount to fingertips and distribute evenly. Gently blend all over face. Can be used over serums and daily moisturizer.Pair with Lanc√¥me Prime It Boost It All Day Eyeshadow Primer on your eyelids for an all-over makeup base.

reviews.headline: Feels so smooth
reviews.comments: I love the feel on my skin and the look on my skin to apply my foundation.

reviews.headline: Love this primer
reviews.comments: I am very picky about primers. I love this one.  Smooths & evens out for foundation, & lasts all day.

reviews.headline: I would not purchase this product again
reviews.comments: I did not find that this product was anything that I would buy again. Really disappointed! I was thinking the brand is good so I would try it

reviews.headline: Best primer I've tried
reviews.comments: This primer is amazing! I've tried many over the years (I'm 45) and never found one that worked for my oily skin. I've used this one for about a week and I'm so impressed. My foundation goes on smooth, lasts all day, and my skin looks smoother. Oil stays under control too. A little goes a long way. I would totally recommend.

reviews.headline: Must have!
reviews.comments: Repeat purchaser of this magical, blurring primer for many years. This makes my skin soft and smooth as a rose petal, covers any pores and stubborn shiny spots like magic. This Lancome primer is my always on hand essential and favorite!

reviews.headline: Definitely
reviews.comments:
Goes on so smoothly, much better than
Other products out there, tried lots

reviews.headline: Holds the foundation
reviews.comments:
It holds my lancome foundation. This base and the full coverage foundation both were the Beauty Steals deals. 
Would be great for sweaty summer weather. I bought these in September, it already feels a bit dry though. The base glides so smooth. However when combined with my other lancome foundation care&glow one, it didn't work like it did with the full coverage one. 
I wouldn't use it if you don't want to emphasize your wrinkles because it somehow made my skin look dry even though it glides. For winter months I am going to skip.

reviews.headline: Perfect for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I only wear powder foundation and this primer is perfect. One pump is all that I need to create a silky barrier. I have sensitive skin and this has caused no irritation or breakouts. It lasts all day despite the humidity.

reviews.headline: I've bought this over and over again‚Ä¶
reviews.comments:
Makes foundation go on smooth as glass. 
It's a definite try!

reviews.headline: I love it!
reviews.comments: My face feels so smooth after applying. I love this so much!

reviews.headline: Love it! Will buy again!
reviews.comments: Came quickly! Very impressed!

reviews.headline: Traditional Primer Feel
reviews.comments: I like that this primer has the traditional primer feel. It does not cause my moisturizer to bead or cape up once it is on.

reviews.headline: Makeup Primer
reviews.comments: I noticed a different the first time usage. It brings about a smoothness and it looks very good on me under my makeup. I will be purchasing it again.

reviews.headline: This product is amazing ü§©üëåüèª
reviews.comments: Is a good product !üëåüèª

reviews.headline: pricey but totally worth it
reviews.comments: This is an amazing primer! Its out of my ideal price for a primer but i cant stop buying its that good.  Blurs my pores, hydrates my skin and helps my makeup last all day

reviews.headline: Ulta bait & switch
reviews.comments: I ordered this online only for promotion of free gift of Id√¥le Eau de Toilette. I live 5 miles of many cosmetic stores that I wouldn't have  waited for shipping. I received my order and no gift. Immediately contacted Ulta customer service and after several back and forth emails, they tell me I didn't SELECT gift???? Or as supplies last but still being listed by product. Will not buy from Ulta again. Too many other options to be treated poorly.

reviews.headline: Game changer
reviews.comments:
This has completely elevated my makeup game. My make up lasts all day, and it looks perfect. 

I am 34 y/o, and its even helped with the fine lines around my eyes.

reviews.headline: Finally found my holy grail primer
reviews.comments: I have used this ONCE and as soon as I felt it on my skin, I knew I would never be going back. I could physically SEE how smooth my skin was after applying. I used a milky toner under it. My makeup has never looked so blended. I hate taky primers and was worried this was going to be one, no this is so smooth and made my face look matte, but I could still apply my foundation and it gave me a dewey look. My makeup melted into my skin and it didn't look cakey at any point

reviews.headline: My go to
reviews.comments: I can wear this primer and not even wear makeup over it because it makes my skin look so nice, just natural with no shine.

reviews.headline: Does not work for me- pills
reviews.comments: I have tried many ways to use it on top of sunscreen and it always pills. I think my combination skin just likes grippy primers.

faceoff_positive.comments:
This was included as a sample in a purchase a month ago and I?m addicted! After using it and visiting a friend she said my skin was glowing ;) and we visit often with each other meaning she saw me days before,
The way I?m apolying this is after shower or face wash, tone, acne medicine roll on (a must!) I? apply my visionaire skin corrector (you gotta get that magic!) then apply this with my finger over my t-zone area, especially in the deep poor areas of my face, due to a few chicken pox scars it?s a must and pores around my nose become invisible. Gone! Buh bye. 
After applying is when I?ll put my make up in order on counter just to let it set some. Doesn?t need it really, just my preference. I?ll even just smooth it once more on my face with clean hands. I?m not using a makeup sponge or anything of the kind, just don?t want to waste this magic 
It?s smooth application, no obvious scent and not greasy. In fact I?m sure it smooths out my face along with keeping foundation looking picture perfect. 
ill try to upload a recent picture. I?m 50. Have had NO surgery or anything else. Just have kept out of the sun, see my dermatologist every couple years and using Lancome products exclusively for nearly 30 years. ONLY skin care line that doesn?t EVER break my face out,
faceoff_positive.headline: Truuuuuust me- get this!

faceoff_negative.comments:
I was so exited to get this product , but after 2-3 use my face start getting break outs. I cud not figur out what was cosing it,blaming on food, stress and etc. After each use, my face was covered in pimples. Finally I checked ingredients and found that it has: Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone Crosspolymer
Wich is synthetic glycerin and silicon .
faceoff_negative.headline: Synthetic silicon.
